## Documentation Issue
A clear description of the documentation problem or improvement suggestion.

## Location
Where is this documentation located?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] Wiki/GitBook
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] API documentation
- [ ] Examples/Samples
- [ ] Other: [specify]

## Current State
What does the documentation currently say (if anything)?

## Suggested Improvement
What should the documentation say instead, or what should be added?

## Why This Matters
Explain why this documentation improvement is important:
- Does it clarify confusion?
- Does it fill a gap?
- Does it correct an error?
- Does it improve understanding?

## Additional Resources
Link to any relevant:
- Code examples
- External documentation
- Related issues or discussions
- Screenshots or diagrams

## Would you like to contribute?
- [ ] Yes, I can submit a pull request with the documentation changes
- [ ] I need help with this
- [ ] I'm just suggesting the improvement
